deviceName.description: Name of the device. For example, `/dev/sda` or `/dev/xvdb`.

ebs.description: Configuration block with Elastic Block Storage (EBS) block device mapping settings. Detailed below.

noDevice.description: Set to `true` to remove a mapping from the parent image.

virtualName.description: Virtual device name. For example, `ephemeral0`. Instance store volumes are numbered starting from 0.
